name: Savage Detectives. Chapter 1: Émile Dubois
description:
Savage Detectives [Prototype]

Journalist by profession, detective by passion. Follow in the footsteps of famous serial killers from Chilean history.

Chapter 1: Emile Dubois 

Valparaíso 1905. You work for the newspaper El Mercurio of Valparaíso, a serial killer is on the loose murdering the most prestigious men in the city; businessmen and elite people die every month.

For the press a petty thief, for the people a social justice. 

You must find the clues, interpret them and build the profile of the murderer. A chronicle awaits to be written on your newspaper desk, a crime to be solved in the history of the country.

---------------------

This project is in the prototype development stage and has been created as a final exam for the Unity XR (VR & AR) course taught by Núcleo Escuela.
